description: d(n) + phi(n), where d(n) is the number of divisors (A000005) and phi(n) is Euler's function (A000010).
comments: If d(n) increases phi(n) tends to go down so the sum has a significance.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..1000
prog: (PARI) { for (n=1, 1000, write("b061468.txt", n, " ", numdiv(n) + eulerphi(n)) ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 23 2009]
author: _Amarnath Murthy_, May 04 2001
extensions: More terms from Winston C. Yang (winston(AT)cs.wisc.edu), May 19 2001
